title: for sale- two T206 Joe Doyles- both sale pending
author: nodgrass

posts.post_title: for sale- two T206 Joe Doyles- both sale pending
posts.post_content:
For sale

T206 Joe Doyle, hands above head, Piedmont 350,  PSA 1.5 . Judge for yourself, but my opinion is this card is undergraded by 1 full grade. $140. shipped  SALE PENDING
T206 Joe Doyle, hands above head, Sweet Caporal 350 factory 30,  PSA 1. Very cool oversized card that that presents higher than its numerical grade.  Not all PSA 1’s are created equal!  No creases. $110 shipped  SALE PENDING
Accepting money orders or Paypal (personal; payment owed).  First firm “I’ll take it” gets the card.  Please send me a private message.
